 The acceleration of the camera when the frame was captured. More...

 A mask of the active lasers when the frame was captured.

 The camera configuration that was in effect at the time of capture.

 The name of the configuration used to capture the configuration.

 The confidence map.

 The CoordinateSystemType used.
 
int32_t cumulativeDroppedSampleCount
 The number of dropped samples since the streaming was started.
 
::DepthSense::Pointer< int16_t > depthMap
 The depth map in fixed point format. This map represents the cartesian depth of each pixel, expressed in millimeters. Valid values lies in the range [0 - 31999]. Saturated pixels are given the special value 32002.
 
::DepthSense::Pointer< float > depthMapFloatingPoint
 The depth map in floating point format. This map represents the cartesian depth of each pixel, expressed in meters. Saturated pixels are given the special value -2.0.
 
int32_t droppedSampleCount
 The number of dropped samples since the last newSampleReceived event was raised.
 
std::vector< uint32_t > exposureHistogram
 The exposure histogram. More...
 
DepthSense::Depth::IMUData imuData
 The IMU state when the frame was captured.
 
::DepthSense::Pointer< int16_t > phaseMap
 The phase map. This map represents the radial phase ([0 - 2 PI[) with respect to the center of the depth camera. Valid values lie in the range [0 - 32767]. Saturated pixels are given the special value -32767.
 
DepthSense::StereoCameraParameters stereoCameraParameters
 The system model parameters that were in effect at the time of capture. More...
 
uint64_t timeOfArrival
 the time of arrival of the sample in the library, expressed in us.
 
uint64_t timeOfCapture
 The time of capture of the sample, expressed in us.
 
::DepthSense::Pointer< DepthSense::UV > uvMap
 The UV mapping. This map represents the normalized coordinates of each pixel in the color map. Invalid pixels are given the special value -FLT_MAX.

std::vector< uint32_t > DepthSense::Depth::SampleData::getExposureHistogram ( )
inline

Gets the value of the SampleData::exposureHistogram property.

The exposure histogram contains the absolute exposure statistics within the frame. Exposure values are proportional to the amount of the total detected photons (from modulated and ambient light combined). Each bin contains half of the number of pixels of which exposure falls within the interval specified by the respective bin edge values

Returns
the value of the SampleData::exposureHistogram property
Exceptions
DepthSense::TransportExceptiona network or protocol error has occurred
std::bad_allocnot enough memory to perform the requested operation

Property Documentation

DepthSense::Depth::Acceleration DepthSense::Depth::SampleData::acceleration
readassign

The sampling frequency of this value is 1 Hz. The coordinate system used is the one specified through coordinateSystemType property.

std::vector< uint32_t > DepthSense::Depth::SampleData::exposureHistogram
readassign

The exposure histogram contains the absolute exposure statistics within the frame. Exposure values are proportional to the amount of the total detected photons (from modulated and ambient light combined). Each bin contains half of the number of pixels of which exposure falls within the interval specified by the respective bin edge values

DepthSense::StereoCameraParameters DepthSense::Depth::SampleData::stereoCameraParameters
readassign

The coordinate system used for the extrinsics is the one specified through coordinateSystemType property.

::DepthSense::Pointer< DepthSense::Vertex > DepthSense::Depth::SampleData::vertices
readassign

This map represents the cartesian 3D coordinates of each pixel, expressed in millimeters. Saturated pixels are given the special value 32002. The coordinate system used is the one specified through coordinateSystemType property.

::DepthSense::Pointer< DepthSense::FPVertex > DepthSense::Depth::SampleData::verticesFloatingPoint
readassign

This map represents the cartesian 3D coordinates of each pixel, expressed in meters. Saturated pixels are given the special value -2.0. The coordinate system used is the one specified through coordinateSystemType property.
